scripts.build: npm run build:prepare && npm run build:html & npm run build:cname & npm run build:img & npm run build:css & npm run build:js & wait
scripts.build:prepare: mkdir -p dist/css & mkdir -p dist/js & mkdir -p dist/img & wait
scripts.build:js: npm run build:js:lib & npm run build:js:app & wait
scripts.build:js:lib: uglifyjs node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js > dist/js/jquery.js & uglifyjs node_modules/lightbox2/dist/js/lightbox.min.js > dist/js/lightbox.js & wait
scripts.build:css: npm run build:css:lib & npm run build:css:app & wait
scripts.build:css:lib: csso node_modules/normalize.css/normalize.css > dist/css/normalize.css & csso node_modules/lightbox2/dist/css/lightbox.min.css > dist/css/lightbox.css & wait
scripts.watch: npm run watch:prepare & npm run watch:js & npm run watch:css & browser-sync start --server --files 'dist/**/*' & wait
